name: Exire II
description:
Exire II

A dating simulator where you get to date this cute man, by the name of Liam.

Keep in mind that he's very shy and sensitive, and would appreciate if you try and be as nice to him as possible. He gets embaressed really easily.

Liam will appreciate you regardless of your gender. His whole purpose is to make you feel loved and special. 

This is yet another little project that I decided to do in my free time.

Guide for the game:

There's files in the 'ptx game files' folder. You need to place them in the 'Exire_Ptx_files' as the game asks.

Note: This is not applied to those who use an Android OS.

Liked the game?

You can buy me a coffee for 1$ on ko-fi.com or you can donate here any amount you want to show your support.

Just press the Download button and contribute a payment of however much you'd like.

Also, please DM me on Twitter @InteractiveSto3 if you find any bugs! I would really appreciate that!

This game is not suitable for children or those who are easily disturbed. This game also contains suggestive language.

Credits:

  • Ren'Py Typewriter Sound by Aquapaulo (Code)
  • A Lucid Dream (Music)
  • Code: Shounen A (V3) by runeraccoon (Character Sprite)
  • 2D Forest Background by Moon Fairy
